placement.title: Placement Servers
placement.vipPlacementLeft: Place in the left VIP block
placement.vipPlacementRight: Place in the right VIP block

questions.q1: What is this service about and how does it work?
questions.a1: L2GTOPLIST is a comprehensive platform for Lineage 2 server announcements and listings. We help players discover new servers and assist server owners in promoting their projects to a wide audience.
questions.a2: A Bonus Start is a special promotional period when new servers offer additional benefits, rewards, or bonuses to players who join during the launch phase.
questions.q3: What does the 'Beginner Bonus' icon mean?
questions.a3: The Beginner Bonus icon indicates that the server offers special rewards, items, or advantages specifically designed for new players to help them get started.
questions.q4: What does the dollar icon mean near some servers?
questions.a4: The dollar icon indicates that the server has premium features, paid services, or donation options available for players who want to enhance their gaming experience.
questions.q5: How do I add my server to your site?
questions.a5: To add your server, please contact our administration team through the available contact methods. We'll guide you through the submission process and placement options.
questions.q6: Who is suitable for VIP placement and Fixed placement?
questions.a6: VIP placement is ideal for established servers with significant player bases or new servers with substantial marketing budgets. Fixed placement suits servers looking for consistent visibility over time.
questions.q7: Who is suitable for the website Wallpaper?
questions.a7: Website wallpaper advertising is perfect for major server launches, special events, or established servers wanting maximum visibility across our entire platform.
questions.q8: Who is suitable for a regular (blue) placement?
questions.a8: Regular placement is suitable for most servers, especially new projects or those with moderate budgets looking for good visibility in our standard listings.
questions.q9: Who is suitable for the side banner?
questions.a9: Side banner placement works well for servers wanting targeted advertising without the premium cost of VIP placement, ideal for mid-range promotional campaigns.
questions.q10: I would like to make a suggestion to improve the service.
questions.a10: We welcome all suggestions! Please contact us through our feedback form or direct communication channels. Your input helps us improve our platform for everyone.

about.title: About Us
about.description: L2GTOPLIST.com is the world's leading Internet portal specializing in announcements about the launch of new Lineage 2 servers. Since 2012, we have been successfully helping players find the perfect projects for the game and supporting server owners in attracting a large number of players at the start.

stats.yearsDesc: 12 years in the Lineage 2 server announcement market, which allowed us to become undisputed leaders in this niche.
stats.usersDesc: 96 thousand players use our resource every month to search for servers, providing them with a convenient and efficient search for the newest and most attractive projects.
stats.serversDesc: More than 100 Lineage 2 servers choose our platform every month to announce their launches, achieving high online performance from the first days of opening.

about.cooperation: We are proud to cooperate with well-known brands in the industry, such as SCRYDE, E-GLOBAL, THEBATTLE.CLUB, EURO-PVP, INTERLUDE-ONLINE, RPG-CLUB, MOON-LAND and many others.
about.mission: Our mission is to provide players with a wide range of high-quality and stable Lineage 2 servers, as well as to create conditions for server owners so that they can attract the attention of an active audience who want to discover new worlds in Lineage 2.
about.goal: We strive to ensure that every player finds their ideal server, and every project is appreciated by Lineage 2 players.
